model_solution: Triangle $ABD$ is a 30-60-90 triangle, so $\frac{BD}{AD}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}$, and $BD=AD\cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}.$
steps: Triangle $ABD$ is a 30-60-90 triangle, so $\frac{BD}{AD}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}$, and $BD=AD\cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}.$
full_steps: Triangle $ABD$ is a 30-60-90 triangle, so $\frac{BD}{AD}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}$, and $BD=AD\cdot \frac{\sqrt{3}}{1}.$
